caption: A man is lying on a taxi saying something to the taxi driver. And then, then taxi driver does something on the man, and he lose his consciousness. Some people in the restaurant see this and one man runs after the taxi, trying to do something. After he wakes up, he finds himself in a room. The taxi driver and him sit around a table, and the driver takes out two bottles, and puts two drugs on the table. After that, the two men begin to talk. During the talk, they burst out an argument. And finally, the video end at there.
